sections.heading: Disavowal precluded in case of assisted conceptionThe husband of the mother may not disavow a child born to his wife as a result of an assisted conception to which he consented
sections.text: Amended by Acts 1976, No. 430, ยง1; Acts 1989, No. 790, ยง1; Acts 2005, No. 192, ยง1, eff. June 29, 2005.
